ssot__OperatingHours__dlm.name: Operating Hours
ssot__OperatingHours__dlm.description: The Operating Hours DMO represents the availability of a business or business function.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__Friday_StartTime__c.description: The time operating hours start on Friday.

ssot__HoursType__c.description: The type for the operating hours.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the operating hour.

ssot__IsActive__c.description: An indicator if the operating hours are active.

ssot__IsDefault__c.description: An indicator if the operating hours are the default.

ssot__IsTimeSlotsUsed__c.description: An indicator if the operating hours time slots are used.

ssot__Monday_StartTime__c.description: The time operating hours start on Monday.

ssot__Thursday_EndTime__c.description: The time operating hours end on Thursday.

ssot__Thursday_StartTime__c.description: The time operating hours start on Thursday.

ssot__TimeZone__c.description: The timezone for the operating hours.

ssot__Tuesday_StartTime__c.description: The time operating hours start on Tuesday.
